description: Try our easy to follow Orange & Currant Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Orange,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Spring,Sesame free,Baking,Father's Day,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Orange & Currant Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4-8 drops yellow food colour (for orange icing)
1.5 cup icing sugar, sifted (for orange icing)
135g butter, softened (save 10g melted butter for orange icing)
1 orange, juiced and rind finely grated
4-8 drops red food colour (for orange icing)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line two large baking trays with baking paper.
Beat butter, sugar and vanilla in a bowl until pale and creamy.
Add to the butter mixture and stir until combined.

Halve dough. Roll out one portion between two sheets of baking paper until 5mm thick. Cut out 15 biscuits using a 6cm fluted cutter. Place onto prepared trays. Bake for 15 minutes or until firm. Cool on trays. Repeat with remaining dough. Decorate with royal icing and sandwich with buttercream.
Follow vanilla cream biscuits recipe from step 1 to 5, adding currants, orange rind and 2 tbs orange juice at step 3 and extra flour at step 4.

Halve dough. Roll out one portion between two sheets of baking paper until 5mm thick. Cut out biscuits using a 6cm round cutter. Place onto prepared trays. Bake for 15 minutes or until firm. Cool on trays. Repeat with remaining dough.

Meanwhile, make the icing. Combine icing sugar, butter and remaining orange juice, stirring until smooth. Stir in drops of food colour to reach desired shade. Spoon or spread onto cooled biscuits. Leave to set.
